quickStart.step3: View results and export data in your preferred format

developers.title: For Developers
items: Validate link structures and SEO optimization
Batch process API endpoints and webhooks
Debug URL routing and navigation issues

marketers.title: For Marketers
items: Validate campaign landing pages and CTAs

security.title: For Security Professionals
items: Monitor suspicious URL patterns and domains
Validate security headers and SSL certificates

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices
items: Use HTTPS URLs for better security and reliability
Include both short and long URLs for comprehensive analysis
Export results regularly for backup and analysis
Use manual input for critical URLs that require verification

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
items: If URLs fail to process, check their format and accessibility
For large batches, consider splitting into smaller groups
Ensure your internet connection is stable during processing
Contact support if you encounter persistent issues

basicVersion.title: Basic Version Instructions
basicVersion.tip: No separate Background Open plugin required, but only simple real URL clicking is possible, and manual proxy IP address refresh is needed.

steps.title: Operation Steps:
steps.step3: Click "Start Click" to implement real URL clicking

advancedVersion.title: Advanced Version Info
advancedVersion.tip: Tip: You must install the separate Background Open extension to enable advanced background real clicking features, including multi-URL mode, single-URL mode, cycle count, and interval settings.
steps: Install Auto Refresh Plus extension and configure proxy IP page auto-refresh (e.g., every 5s)
Enter URLs and corresponding parameters in multi-URL or single-URL mode
Click "Start Click" to implement background real URL clicking
scenarios: Multi-URL: For all running offers daily click supplementation, flexibly set cycle count for gradual supplementation
Single-URL: For rapid click supplementation on high-performing offers, maximum support for 1000 clicks at once for intensive supplementation

silentVersion.title: Silent Version Info
silentVersion.tip: No plugin installation required. Real browser access implemented through backend Chromium browser, supporting proxy IP rotation, custom Referer and other features

technicalFeatures: Supports proxy IP rotation, simulating real user access
Random social media Referer to improve access authenticity
Smart User-agent rotation to avoid detection as automated access
notes: Requires valid proxy IP service configuration
Consumes server resources, use as needed
